description: Heavily bloated file. Almost everything is baked-in model knowledge or generic best practices.

sections.name: Code Style
sections.reason: All items are baked-in JavaScript best practices the model already knows

sections.name: Security
sections.reason: Standard OWASP practices the model already knows

sections.name: Git Workflow
sections.reason: Standard git practices, most already enforced by Claude Code defaults

sections.name: My Project Structure
sections.reason: Discoverable by reading the filesystem. Could be a single line pointer or removed entirely.

sections.name: Debugging
sections.reason: Generic debugging methodology the model already follows

sections.name: Python Preferences
sections.reason: Only relevant when working on Python files. Should be in a nested CLAUDE.md near Python code.

sections.name: Deployment
sections.reason: Only relevant during deployments. Move near deploy configs or as a hook for critical rules.

sections.name: API Design
sections.reason: Standard REST conventions the model already knows
